mapper.select: SELECT t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo, ROUND(AVG(r.bamboo_score),0) AS bambooScore FROM talent t, review r WHERE t.talent_no = r.talent_no AND status = '게시중' GROUP BY t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo ORDER BY t.talent_no DESC

SELECT t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo, ROUND(AVG(r.bamboo_score),0) AS bambooScore FROM talent t, review r WHERE t.talent_no = r.talent_no AND status = '게시중' AND upper_category_no = #{upperCategoryNo} GROUP BY t.talent_no, t.seller_id, t.main_img, t.title, t.summary, t.bamboo, t.sale_bamboo ORDER BY t.talent_no DESC
